biocontainers.name: islandpath
biocontainers.summary: Islandpath-dimob is a standalone software to predict genomic islands in bacterial and archaeal genomes based on the presence of dinucleotide biases and mobility genes.\n\ngenomic islands (gis) are clusters of genes in prokaryotic genomes of probable horizontal origin. gis are disproportionately associated with microbial adaptations of medical or environmental interest.

biotools.summary: This tool aids genomic island detection in prokaryotic genome seqeunces, using features such as dinucleotide bias, G+C, location of tRNA genes, annotations of mobility genes, etc. Genomic islands are defined here as genomic regions of potential horizontal origin.

bioschemas.name: IslandPath
bioschemas.summary: This tool aids genomic island detection in prokaryotic genome seqeunces, using features such as dinucleotide bias, G+C, location of tRNA genes, annotations of mobility genes, etc. Genomic islands are defined here as genomic regions of potential horizontal origin.
